member.name: M:UL.Aria.Web.Portal.AriaApplication.Application_Start(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Application_Start method is called only one time during the life cycle of an application. Called when the first resource (such as a page) in an ASP.NET application is requested. You can use this method to perform startup tasks such as loading data into the cache and initializing static values. You should set only static data during application start. Do not set any instance data because it will be available only to the first instance of the HttpApplication class that is created.
